availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Winnifred Raines. Father of William T. Raines, John M. Raines, James H. Raines, Abigail Raines, and Richard S. Raines. Laborer in Owen County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 253A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, Subdivision 1, p. 329.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, p. 639.
